answers.answer: Hi,It is important to undergo testing for thyroid dysfunction. Also peripheral neuropathy due to B 12 deficiency and diabetes needs to be ruled out. A brain scan will help in ruling out neurological lesions like TIA or MS.Please discuss this with your treating doctor. Thanks
